data.message: i cant send message its says "This message failed to send. Click to send again." but have internet. am i block? or something? please help me/

replies.message: Hey Robert. When your message fails to send, you can try resending it by clicking on the exclamation point icon to the right of the message. If this doesn't work, make sure your chat is turned on. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2g5t3Eg. If you continue to experience issues sending messages, please fill out this form to let us know more: http://bit.ly/2wo7K78. We hope this helps! -Elizabeth
